titleStmt.title: Solomons sentences. Being an excellent ditty, shewing the sage sayings and wise sentences of Solomon. The tune is, Wigmore's galliard.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
Printed on same sheet as Wing S4661A (TCP B05907), to which it serves as part 1 of 2.
